Bronwyn Katz (a mụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe mà bụrụ kwá onye na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ onye guzobere iQhiya Collective, netwọk nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Cape Town na Johannesburg, South Africa.
A mụrụ Katz na 1993 na Kimberley, South Africa. Ọ gara Mahadum nke Cape Town, South Africa ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2015 na BFA. E nyere ya Simon Gerson Prize na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Ọrụ Katz gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye, vidiyo na arụmọrụ

N'iji echiche nke ala dị ka ebe nchekwa nke ebe nchekwa, ọrụ ya na-egosipụta echiche nke ebe ma ọ bụ ohere dị ka ahụmịhe dị ndụ na ya mere ikike nke ala icheta ma kwurịta ncheta nke ọrụ ya. N'afọ 2016, e mere ihe ngosi ya nke akpọrọ Groenpunt na Blank Projects na mbà bCape Town.
Katz emeela ihe ngosi ise naanị ya ma sonyekwa na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu gụnyere;
Katz bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg.
